articles.title: Rupert Murdoch: How magnate transformed Australia’s media - BBC
articles.description: The 92-year-old businessman changed the face of news worldwide, but it all started at home.
articles.content:
When Rupert Murdoch started his career, he was young, hungry and desperate to claw back his family's stake in Australia's news business. 
Known as "the boy publisher" - the 22-year-old had inherited… [+5692 chars]
